name: homey-electrolux-pure
description: Adds support for Electrolux Pure air purifiers

scripts.start: yarn build && cd .homeybuild && homey app run
scripts.install-app: yarn build && cd .homeybuild && homey app install
scripts.validate: yarn build && cd .homeybuild && homey app validate
scripts.publish: yarn build && cd .homeybuild && homey app publish
scripts.build: echo '{}' > app.json && homey app build && cp env.json .homeybuild/ && cd .homeybuild && yarn workspaces focus --production
